VASSAL.tools.imageop

Class OpIcon

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.ImageIcon
      • VASSAL.tools.imageop.OpIcon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Icon

    public class OpIcon
extends javax.swing.ImageIcon
implements javax.swing.Icon
    An implementation of Icon using an ImageOp as a source.
    Since:
    3.1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • paintIcon

        public void paintIcon(java.awt.Component c,
                      java.awt.Graphics g,
                      int x,
                      int y)

        The given ImageOp is called asynchronously when painting, so as not to block the Event Dispatch Thread.
